kb.start: Welcome on the ELM Corporation website, I am here to help you.

first_xor.initials: Do you want to proceed with a general guide trough the website or are you interested only in our contacts?

utterance: Okay, so let's start with the general tour of the website

first_xor.unknown: I have not understand. Options: Guide or Contacts.

guide.initials: Welcome to the guide of our website, when you are ready tell me it.

home.initials: Welcome to the Homepage of the ELM Corporation website. Here you can find the main areas of the services offered by us.

about.initials: Welcome to the About Us page of the ELM Corporation website. Here you can find all the information about our company.

contact_xor.initials: Welcome to the Contact Us page. Do you want to directly contact us through a form or are you interested only in our general contact information?
contact_xor.unknown: I have not understand. Options: Form or Contact info.

contact_form.initials: Now you can fill this form and send it to the company.

contact_page.initials: Here you can all our contacts.

kb.end: The process is completed. Thank you for your interest!
kb.stay_message: I didn't understand. Do you want to continue?
